SA10n1049:13: nāgārjunāya praṇipatya tasmai tatkārikāṇāṃ vivṛtiṃ kariṣye |
SA10n1049:15: tatra 'na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām' ityādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ śāstram |
SA10n1049:17: madhyamakāvatāravihitavidhinā advayajñānālaṃkṛtaṃ mahākaruṇopāyapuraḥsaraṃ prathamacittotpādaṃ tathāgatajñānotpattihetumādiṃ kṛtvā yāvadācāryanāgārjunasya viditāviparītaprajñāpāramitānīteḥ karuṇayā parāvabodhārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanam,
SA10n1049:22: tadaviparīta saṃprakāśatvena māhātmyamudbhāvya tatsvabhāvāvyatirekavartine paramagurave tathāgatāya śāstrapraṇayana nimittakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kartukāma āha-
SA10n1049:54: samutpūrvaḥ padiḥ prādurbhāvārtha iti samutpādaśabdaḥ prādurbhāve vartate |
SA10n1049:59: ityevaṃ taddhitāntamityaśabdaṃ vyutpādya prati prati ityānāṃ vināśināṃ samutpāda iti varṇayanti |
SA10n1049:61: “ yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharma paśyati “ ityevamādau viṣaye vīpsārthasya saṃbhavāt samāsasadbhāvācca syājjyāyasī vyutpattiḥ |
SA10n1049:62: iha tu “ cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam “ ityevamādau viṣaye sākṣādaṅgīkṛtārtha viśeṣe cakṣuḥ pratītyeti pratītyaśabda ekacakṣurindriyahetukāyāmapyekavijñānotpattāvabhīṣṭāyāṃ kuto vīpsārthatā ?
SA10n1049:68: taddhitānte cetyaśabde“ cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam“ ityatra pratītyaśabdasyāvyayatvābhāvāt samāsāsadbhāvācca vibhaktiśrutau satyāṃ cakṣuḥ pratītya vijñānaṃ rūpāṇi ca iti nipātaḥ syāt |
SA10n1049:74: tāṃstān pratyayān pratītya samutpādaḥ prāpya saṃbhava ityeke |
SA10n1049:75: prati prati vināśināmutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityanye“- iti paravyākhyānamanūdya dūṣaṇamabhidhatte,
SA10n1049:83: tena idānīṃ prāpya saṃbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityevaṃ vyutpāditena pratītyasamutpādaśabdena yadi niravaśeṣasaṃbhavipadārthaparāmarśo vivakṣitaḥ,
SA10n1049:84: tadā tāṃ tāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya saṃbhava pratītya samutpāda iti vīpsāsaṃbandhaḥ kriyate |
SA10n1049:86: tadā cakṣuḥ prāpya rūpāṇi ceti na vīpsāyāḥ saṃbandha iti ||
SA10n1049:90: ayuktametat “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam“ iti,
SA10n1049:94: kathamanenaiva tatprāpteḥ saṃbhava iti yuktyanupādānena pratijñāmātratvāt |
SA10n1049:116: asminsatīdaṃ bhavati hrasve dīrgha yathā sati |
SA10n1049:121: tataśca yadeva dūṣyate tadevābhyupagamyate iti na yujyate |
SA10n1049:123: tadevaṃ hetupratyayāpekṣaṃ bhāvānāmutpādaṃ paridīpayatā bhagavatā ahetvekahetuviṣamahetusaṃbhūtatvaṃ svaparobhayakṛtatvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ niṣiddhaṃ bhavati,
SA10n1049:124: tanniṣedhācca sāṃvṛtānāṃ padārthānāṃ yathāvasthitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamudbhāvitaṃ bhavati |
SA10n1049:125: sa evedānīṃ sāṃvṛtaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvād āryajñānāpekṣayā nāsminnirodho vidyate yāvannāsminnirgamo vidyate ityanirodhādibhiraṣṭābhirviśe ṣaṇairviśiṣyate |
SA10n1049:126: yathā ca nirodhādayo na santi pratītyasamutpādasya tathā sakalaśāstreṇa pratipādayiṣyati ||
SA10n1049:129: prapañcānāmupaśamo'sminniti sa eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ prapañcopaśama ityucyate |
SA10n1049:131: yathābhihitaviśeṣaṇasya pratītyasamutpādasya deśanākriyayā īpsitatamatvāt karmaṇā nirdeśaḥ ||
SA10n1049:136: yathopavarṇitapratītyasamutpādāvagamācca tathāgatasyaivaikasyāviparītārthavāditvaṃ paśyan sarvapara pravādāṃśca bālapralāpānivāvetya atīva prasādānugata ācāryo bhūyo bhagavantaṃ viśeṣayati-vadatāṃ varamiti ||
SA10n1049:137: atra ca nirodhasya pūrvaṃ prativedhaḥ utpādanirodhayoḥ paurvāparyāvasthāyāḥ siddhayabhāvaṃ dyotayitum |
SA10n1049:141: iti | tasmānnāyaṃ niyamo yat pūrvamutpādena bhavitavyaṃ paścānnirodheneti ||
SA10n1049:142: idānīmanirodhādiviśiṣṭapratītyasamutpādapratipipādayiṣayā utpādapratiṣedhena nirodhādi pratiṣedhasaukarya manyamāna ācāryaḥ prathamamevotpādaprativedhamārabhate |
SA10n1049:143: utpādo hi paraiḥ parikalpya mānaḥ svato vā parikalpyeta,
SA10n1049:148: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ |
SA10n1049:149: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kkacana kecana ||3 ||
SA10n1049:151: kkacanaśabda ādhāravacanaḥ kkacicchabdaparyāyaḥ kecanaśabda ādheyavacanaḥ kecicchabdaparyāyaḥ |
SA10n1049:152: tataścaivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ - naiva svata utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10n1049:155: nanu ca- naiva svata utpannā ityavadhāryamāṇe parata utpannā ityaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti |
SA10n1049:158: yayā copapattyā svata utpādo na saṃbhavati, sā-
SA10n1049:159: tasmāddhi tasya bhavane na guṇo'sti kaści-
SA10n1049:160: jjātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam |
SA10n1049:165: na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ padārthānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamasti |
SA10n1049:170: prasaṅga vākyatvācca prakṛtārthaviparyayeṇa viparītārthasādhyataddharmavyaktau parasmādutpannābhāvājanmasāphalyāt janmaniro(bo ?)
SA10n1049:178: pṛcchayate-svata iti hetutvena tadeva cotpadyate iti?
SA10n1049:179: na ca vidyamānasya punarutpattau prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ,
SA10n1049:181: na ca tvayā utpannasya punarutpāda iṣyate'navasthā cāpyaniṣṭeti |
SA10n1049:183: kimiti codite paronābhyupaiti yato hetudṛṣṭāntopādānasāphalyaṃ syāt?
SA10n1049:187: tasmātsarvathā priyānumānatāmevātmanaḥ ācāryaḥ prakaṭayati asthāne'pyanumānaṃ praveśayan |
SA10n1049:188: na ca mādhyamikasya sataḥ svatantramanumānaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ pakṣāntarābhyupagamābhāvāt |
SA10n1049:193: yadi kācana pratijñā syānme tata eva me bhaveddoṣaḥ |
SA10n1049:194: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ ||
SA10n1049:198: tadā kutaḥ “ nādhyātmikānyāyata nāni svata utpannāni“ iti svatantrā pratijñā yasyāṃ sāṃkhyāḥ pratyavasthāpyante |
SA10n1049:199: ko'rya pratijñārthaḥ kiṃ kāryātmakatvātsvata uta kāraṇātmakatvāditi |
SA10n1049:203: kuto'smākaṃ vidyamānatvāditi heturyasya siddhasādhanaṃ viruddhārthatā vā syāt,
SA10n1049:204: yasya siddhasādhanasya yasyāśca viruddhārthatāyāḥ parihārārthaṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
SA10n1049:206: athāpi syāt- mādhyamikānāṃ pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntānāmasiddheḥ svatantrānumānānabhidhāyi tvāt svata utpattipratiṣedhapratijñātārthasādhanaṃ mā bhūdubhayasiddhena vānumānena parapratijñānirākaraṇam |
SA10n1049:207: parapratijñāyāstu svata evānumānavirodhacodanayā svata eva pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntadoṣarahitaiḥ pakṣādibhirbhavitavyam |
SA10n1049:208: tataśca tadanabhidhānāt taddoṣāparihārācca sa eva doṣa iti |
SA10n1049:213: tena svaniścayavadanyeṣāṃ niścayotpādanecchayā yayā upapattyā asāvartho'dhigataḥ saivopapattiḥ parasmai upadeṣṭavyā |
SA10n1049:217: hetudṛṣṭāntāsaṃbhavāt pratijñānusāratayaiva kevalaṃ svapratijñātārthasādhanamupādatta iti nirupapattikapakṣābhyupagamāt svātmāna mevāyaṃ kevalaṃ visaṃvādayan na śaknoti pareṣāṃ niścayamādhātumiti |
SA10n1049:218: idamevāsya spaṣṭataraṃ dūṣaṇaṃ yaduta svapratijñātārthasādhanāsāmarthyamiti kimatrānumānabādhodbhāvanayā prayojanam ?
SA10n1049:224: atra hi tadityanena svātmanā vidyamānasya parāmarśaḥ |
SA10n1049:227: na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamiti |
SA10n1049:228: anena ca vākyena sādhyasādhanadharmānugatasya paraprasiddhasya sādharmyadṛṣṭāntasyopādānam |
SA10n1049:237: iha hi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ puro'vasthitaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ punarutpādānapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭam,
SA10n1049:238: tathā ca mṛtpiṇḍādyavasthāyāmapi yadi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ ghaṭādikamiti manyase,
SA10n1049:239: tadāpi tasya svātmanā vidyamānasya nāstyutpāda iti |
SA10n1049:240: evaṃ svātmanā vidyamānatvena upanayābhivyaktena punarutpādapratiṣedhāvyabhicāriṇā hetunā svata eva sāṃkhyasyānumānavirodhodbhāvanamanuṣṭhitameveti |
SA10n1049:242: na ca kevalaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1049:245: sāṃkhyā hi naiva abhivyaktarūpasya puro'vasthitasya ghaṭasya punarabhivyaktimicchanti |
SA10n1049:248: anabhivyaktarūpasya ca śaktirūpāpannasya utpattipratiṣedhaviśiṣṭasādhyatvāt kutaḥ siddhasādhanapakṣadoṣāśaṅkā,
SA10n1049:253: athavā | ayamanyaḥ prayogamārgaḥ-puruṣavyatiriktāḥ padārthāḥ svata utpattivādinaḥ |
SA10n1049:258: yadyapi ca abhivyaktivādina utpādapratiṣedho na bādhakaḥ,
SA10n1049:259: tathāpi abhivyaktāvutpādaśabdaṃ nipātya pūrvaṃ paścācca anupalabdhyupalabdhisādharmyeṇa utpādaśabdenābhivyakterevābhidhānādayaṃ pratiṣedho na abādhakaḥ ||
SA10n1049:260: kathaṃ punarayaṃ yathoktārthābhidhānaṃ vinā vyastavicāro labhyata iti cet, taducyate |
SA10n1049:263: tāni ca vyākhyāyamānāni yathoktamarthātmānaṃ prasūyanta iti nātra kiṃcidanupāttaṃ saṃbhāvyate ||
SA10n1049:267: parasya ca yāvadbahavo doṣāḥ prasaṅgaviparītāpattyā āpadyante,
SA10n1049:269: kuto nu khalu aviparītācāryanāgārjunamatānusāriṇaḥ ācāryabuddhapālitasya sāvakāśavacanābhidhāyitvam,
SA10n1049:273: na hi śabdāḥ dāṇḍapāśikā iva vaktāramasvatantrayanti,
SA10n1049:276: tathā ca ācāryo bhūyasā prasaṅgāpattimukhenaiva parapakṣaṃ nirākaroti sma | tadyathā-
SA10n1049:282: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā ||
SA10n1049:283: ityādinā | atha arthavākyatvādācāryavākyānāṃ mahārthatve sati anekaprayoniṣpattihetutvaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10n1049:289: api ca | ātmanastarkaśāstrātikauśalamātramāviścikīrṣayā aṅgīkṛtamadhyamakadarśanasyāpi yatsvatantraprayogavākyābhidhānaṃ tadatitarāmanekadoṣasamudāyāspadamasya tārkikasyopalakṣyate |
SA10n1049:291: tatra yattāvadevamuktam - atra prayogavākyaṃ bhavati - na paramārthataḥ ādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni,
SA10n1049:300: “ sa cāyaṃ bījahetuko'ṅkura utpadyamāno na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto nāpya hetusamutpanno niśvarakālāṇuprakṛtisvabhāvasaṃbhūtaḥ“ iti |
SA10n1049:302: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro |
SA10n1049:303: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanucchedaaśāśvatadharmatā ||
SA10n1049:305: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
SA10n1049:311: satyadvayāviparītadarśanaparibhraṣṭā eva hi tīrthikā yāvadubhayathāpi niṣidhyante tāvad guṇa eva saṃbhāvyata iti |
SA10n1049:315: loko hi svataḥ parata ityevamādikaṃ vicāramanavatārya kāraṇātkāryamutpadyate ityetāvanmātraṃ pratipannaḥ |
SA10n1049:318: api ca | yadi saṃvṛtyā utpattipratiṣedhanirācikīrṣuṇā viśeṣaṇametadupādīyate,
SA10n1049:324: sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthata utpattipratiṣedhād utpattipratiṣedhaviśeṣaṇe paramārthagrahaṇamiti cet,
SA10n1049:325: evaṃ tarhi evameva vaktavyaṃ syāt-sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthato nāstyutpattiriti |
SA10n1049:328: prajñaptisatāmanabhyupagamāt parato'siddhādhāraḥ pakṣadoṣaḥ syāditi na yuktametat ||
SA10n1049:329: atha syāt - yathā anityaḥ śabda iti dharmadharmisāmānyameva gṛhyate na viśeṣaḥ,
SA10n1049:331: tathā hi - yadi cāturmahābhautikaḥ śabdo gṛhyate,
SA10n1049:335: tathā vaiśeṣikasya śabdānityatāṃ pratijānānasya yadi kāryaḥ śabdo gṛhyate,
SA10n1049:352: yadā ca aviparyāsādabhūtaṃ nādhyāropitaṃ vitaimirikeṇeva keśādi,
SA10n1049:359: ato viduṣāmaviparītāvasthāyāṃ viparītasyāsaṃbhavātkutaḥ sāṃvṛtaṃ cakṣuḥ yasya dharmitvaṃ syāt ?
SA10n1049:364: tatra hi śabdasāmānyamanityatāsāmānyaṃ ca avivakṣita- viśeṣaṃ dvayorapi saṃvidyate |
SA10n1049:365: na tvevaṃ cakṣuḥ sāmānyaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāvādibhyāṃ saṃvṛtyā aṅgīkṛtaṃ nāpi paramārthataḥ |
SA10n1049:375: asya paropakṣiptasya sādhanasyedaṃ dūṣaṇamabhihitamanena - ko hi bhavatāmabhipreto'tra hetvarthaḥ?
SA10n1049:383: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate ||
SA10n1049:385: tataśca paramārthato nirvartyanirvartakatvāsiddheḥ asiddhārthatā viruddhārthatā vā hetoriti ||
SA10n1049:387: tasmātsarveṣvevānumāneṣu vastu dharmopanyastahetukeṣu svata evaṃ hetvādīnāmasiddhatvāt sarvāṇyeva sādhanāni vyāhanyante |
SA10n1049:391: athavā - na pare paramārthena vivakṣitāḥ cakṣurādyādhyātmikāyatananirvartakāḥ pratyayā iti pratīyante,
SA10n1049:395: yathā cānena - utpannā eva ādhyātmikā bhāvāḥ,
SA10n1049:397: atha samāhitasya yoginaḥ prajñācakṣuṣā bhāvayāthātmyaṃ paśyataḥ utpādagatyādayaḥ santi paramārthata iti sādhyate,
SA10n1049:403: na paramārthataḥ sabhāgaṃ cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati,
SA10n1049:414: utāho ghaṭādivat svata utpadyantāmiti ghaṭādīnāṃ sādhyasamatvānnānaikāntikateti cet,
SA10n1049:418: evaṃ svānumāneṣvapi yathoktadūṣaṇaprasaṅge sati sa eva asiddhādhārāsiddhahetvādidoṣaḥ prāpnoti,
SA10n1049:420: na tenaikaścodyo bhavatīti sarvametaddūṣaṇamayuktaṃ jāyata iti |
SA10n1049:424: tathā hi - paraḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti pratipannaḥ |
SA10n1049:427: tasmād yatra yatra svātmādarśanaṃ tatra tatra paradarśanamapi nāsti,
SA10n1049:431: tataśca svātmādarśanaviruddhaṃ nīlādiparadarśanaṃ svaprasiddhenaivānumānena virudhyata iti etāvanmātramasmadanūmānairudbhāvyata iti kuto'smatpakṣe yathoktadoṣāvatāraḥ,
SA10n1049:437: kadāciddhi loke arthipratyarthibhyāṃ pramāṇīkṛtasya sākṣiṇo vacanena jayo bhavati parājayo vā,
SA10n1049:439: paravacanena tu na jayo nāpi parājayaḥ |
SA10n1049:443: ata eva kaiściduktam - na parataḥ prasiddhibalādanumānabādhā,
SA10n1049:448: tenāpi laukikīṃ vyavasthāmanurudhyamānena anumāne yathokta eva nyāyo'bhyupeyaḥ ||
SA10n1049:449: tathā hi nobhayaprasiddhena vā āgamena bādhā,
SA10n1049:459: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate |
SA10n1049:461: tataśca parābhāvādeva nāpi parata utpadyante | api ca -
SA10n1049:467: ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe- na parata utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10n1049:468: sarvataḥ sarvasaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha -tadatra prasaṅgavākyatvāt sādhyasādhanaviparyayaṃ kṛtvā,
SA10n1049:469: svataḥ ubhayataḥ ahetuto vā utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10n1049:474: pūrvameva pratipāditatvād dūṣaṇāntaḥpātitvācca parapratijñātārthadūṣaṇeneti yatkiṃcidetaditi na punaryatna āsthīyate ||
SA10n1049:478: syādubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādekaikakṛtaṃ yadi | iti ||
SA10n1049:480: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate |
SA10n1049:487: atrācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha - atrāpi prasaṅgavākyatvāt yadi viparītasādhyasādhana vyaktivākyārtha iṣyate,
SA10n1049:488: tadā etaduktaṃ bhavati - hetuta utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10n1049:500: yattarhi bhagavatoktam - avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā avidyānirodhātsaṃskāranirodha iti, tathā-
SA10n1049:503: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukhaḥ ||
SA10n1049:504: tathā - utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
SA10n1049:505: eko dharmaḥ sattvasthitaye yaduta catvāra āhārāḥ,
SA10n1049:506: dvau dharmau lokaṃ pālayato hrīścāpatrāpyaṃ cetyādi,
SA10n1049:516: tattvadarśanāpekṣayā tūktaṃ bhagavatā - etaddhi bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharma nirvāṇam,
SA10n1049:518: tathā - nāstyatra tathatā vā avitathatā vā |
SA10n1049:527: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ |
SA10n1049:530: yasyaivaṃ deśanābhiprāyānabhijñatayā saṃdehaḥ syāt - kā hyatra deśanā tattvārthā,
SA10n1049:533: tayorubhayorapi vineyajanayoḥ ācāryo yuktyāgamābhyāṃ saṃśayamithyājñānāpākaraṇārthaṃ śāstramidamārabdhavān ||
SA10n1049:536: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā ||
SA10n1049:548: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnya-tānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥ sattvanirjīvaniḥ pudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāḥ ta ucyante nītārthāḥ |
SA10n1049:557: nanu ca - utpādādīnāmabhāve sati yadi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvapratipādanārthamidamārabdhavānācāryaḥ nanvevaṃ sati yanmṛṣā na tadastīti na santyakuśalāni karmāṇi,
SA10n1049:564: saṃvṛtisatyavyapekṣayā lokasya idaṃsatyābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛṣārthatā bhāvānāṃ pratipādyate'smābhiḥ |
SA10n1049:565: naiva tvāryāḥ kṛtakāryāḥ kiṃcidupalabhante yanmṛṣā amṛṣā vā syāditi |
SA10n1049:567: yena hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ parijñātaṃ kiṃ tasya karmāṇi santi,
SA10n1049:569: na cāpyasau kasyaciddharmassya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vopalabhate |
SA10n1049:571: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate |
SA10n1049:573: yannopalabhyate tannaiva atītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam |
SA10n1049:583: sa dharme dhvidaṃsatyābhiniveśādabhiniviṣṭaḥ san karmāṇyapi karoti,
SA10n1049:586: kiṃ punaḥ - mṛṣāsvabhāvā api padārthāḥ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti |
SA10n1049:590: tadyathā kulaputra māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaścidrāgaparītacittāḥ parṣacchāradyabhayena utthāyāsanādapakrāmet,
SA10n1049:597: tathā mṛṣāsvabhāvā api bhāvā bālānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti ||
SA10n1049:599: atha khalu tāni pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavato dharmadeśanāmanavatarantyanavagāhamānānyanadhimucyamānāni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni |
SA10n1049:600: atha bhagavān [tasyāṃ velāyāṃ] yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣavo gacchanti sma,
SA10n1049:601: tasmin mārge dvau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma ||
SA10n1049:602: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena [mārgeṇa] tau dvau bhikṣū [nirmitakau] tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma |
SA10n1049:607: tamāvāṃ nāvatarāvo nāvagāhāvahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāvaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāvahe |
SA10n1049:608: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan - vayamapyāyuṣmanto bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe |
SA10n1049:610: nirmitakāvavocatām - tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ |
SA10n1049:614: nirmitakāvavocatām - kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣapayiṣyatha ?
SA10n1049:615: tānyavocan - na te'dhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante,
SA10n1049:617: nirmitakāvavocatām - tena hi āyuṣmanto mā kalpayata,
SA10n1049:619: yadā cāyuṣmanto na kalpayiṣyatha na vikalpayiṣyatha,
SA10n1049:624: samādhiḥ prajñā vimuktirvimuktijñānadarśana māyuṣmanto na saṃsarati na parinirvāti |
SA10n1049:638: bhikṣūnetadavocat - kutrāyuṣmanto gatāḥ kuto vāgatāḥ te'vocan - na kkacidgamanāya na kutaścidāgamanāya bhadanta subhūte bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ āha - ko nāmāyuṣmatāṃ śāstā ?
SA10n1049:643: āhuḥ - yasya na kāyo na cittam |
SA10n1049:650: āha - kiyaccireṇāyuṣmantaḥ parinirvāsyanti āhuḥ - yadā tathāgatanirmitāḥ parinirvāsyanti |
SA10n1049:660: āhuḥ - na kāyena na vācā na manasā |
SA10n1049:669: iti hyāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ paripṛcchatasteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ prativisarjayatāṃ tasyāṃ parṣadi aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
SA10n1049:670: dvātriṃśataśca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurviśuddham | iti ||
SA10n1049:671: ityevaṃ mṛṣāsvabhāvābhyāṃ tathāgatanirmitābhyāṃ bhikṣubhyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ vyavadānanibandhanaṃ kṛtamiti ||
SA10n1049:673: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kāṇḍaṃ ca pratītya mathanīṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya hastavyāyāmaṃ ca pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavatīti agnirabhinirvartate |
SA10n1049:674: sa cāgnisaṃtāpo na kāṇḍasaṃniśrito na mathanīsaṃniśrito na puruṣahastavyāyāmasaṃniśritaḥ |
SA10n1049:675: evameva mañjuśrīḥ asadviparyāsamohitasya puruṣapudgalasya utpadyate rāgaparidāho dveṣaparidāho mohaparidāhaḥ |
SA10n1049:676: sa ca paridāho nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇa sthitaḥ ||
SA10n1049:677: api tu mañjuśrīḥ yaducyate moha iti,
SA10n1049:679: atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmairmohastenocyate moha iti |
SA10n1049:680: tathā narakamukhā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā idaṃ dhāraṇīpadam |
SA10n1049:685: tatkiṃ manyase mañjuśrīḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtā narakā uta svabhāvasaṃbhūtāḥ ?
SA10n1049:686: āha - svavikalpenaiva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanāṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokaṃ saṃjānanti |
SA10n1049:687: te ca asatsamāropeṇa duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti duḥkhamanubhavanti triṣvapyapāyeṣu ||
SA10n1049:688: yathā cāhaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi tathā nārakaṃ duḥkham |
SA10n1049:689: tadyathā bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte |
SA10n1049:690: sa tatra kkathitāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmanekapauruṣāyāṃ lohakumbhyāṃ prakṣiptamātmānaṃ saṃjānīyāt |
SA10n1049:691: sa tatra kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayet |
SA10n1049:692: sa tatra mānasaṃ paridāhaṃ saṃjānīyāt uttraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta |
SA10n1049:693: sa tatra pratibuddhaḥ samānaḥ - aho duḥkham,
SA10n1049:696: atha tasya mitrajñāti sālohitāḥ paripṛccheyuḥ - kena tatte duḥkhamiti |
SA10n1049:697: sa tān mitrajñātisālohitānevaṃ vadet - nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhūtam |
SA10n1049:698: sa tānākrośet paribhāṣet - ahaṃ ca nāma nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhavāmi |
SA10n1049:699: yūyaṃ ca me uttari paripṛcchatha kenaitattava duḥkhamiti |
SA10n1049:700: atha te mitrajñātisālohitāstaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ - mā bhairmoḥ puruṣa |
SA10n1049:706: tadyathā bhagavan sa puruṣo'satsamāropeṇa suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīyāt,
SA10n1049:707: evameva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanā asadbhāgaparyavanaddhāḥ strīnimittaṃ kalpayanti |
SA10n1049:708: te strīnimittaṃ kalpayitvā tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ ramamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānanti |
SA10n1049:712: tasya tena cchandarāgaparyavasthitena cittena bhogaparyeṣṭiṃ cittaṃ krāmayanti |
SA10n1049:715: sa tena saṃjñāviparyāsena kālagataḥ samāno bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti ||
SA10n1049:716: tadyathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitrajñātisālohitā evaṃ vadanti - mā bhaiḥ,
SA10n1049:720: evameva buddhā bhagavantaścaturviparyāsaviparyastānāṃ sattvānāmevaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti- nātra strī na puruṣo na sattvo na jīvo na puruṣo na pudgalaḥ |
SA10n1049:729: te imāṃ tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā vigatarāgān sarvadharmān paśyanti |
SA10n1049:732: te kālagatāḥ samānā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti |
SA10n1049:751: tadevamete'svabhāvā bhāvāḥ svaviparyāsaviṭhapitā bālānāṃ saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam ||
SA10n1049:752: yathā ca mṛṣāsvabhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānahetutvaṃ tathā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇā vaseyam ||
SA10n1049:753: atrāha - yadi svataḥ parataḥ ubhayato'hetutaśca nāsti bhāvānāmutpādaḥ ,
SA10n1049:754: tatra kathamavidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā? ucyate |
SA10n1049:760: idaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagame hi sati hetuphalayoranyonyāpekṣatvānnāsti svābhāvikī siddhiriti nāsti sasvabhāvavādaḥ |
SA10n1049:765: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam |
SA10n1049:772: atra kecitparicodayanti - anutpannā bhāvā iti kimayaṃ pramāṇajo niścaya utāpramāṇajaḥ?
SA10n1049:774: tadedaṃ vaktavyam - kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi,
SA10n1049:775: kiṃ svata utpannāni kiṃ parata ubhayato'hetuto veti |
SA10n1049:779: anadhigato hyartho na vinā pramāṇairadhigantuṃ śakyata iti pramāṇābhāvādarthādhigamābhāve sati kuto'yaṃ samyagniścaya iti na yuktametadaniṣpannā bhāvā iti |
SA10n1049:780: yato vāyaṃ niścayo bhavato'nutpannā bhāvā iti bhaviṣyati,
SA10n1049:782: yathā cāyaṃ te niścayaḥ -anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti ,
SA10n1049:784: atha te nāsti niścayo'nutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti,
SA10n1049:796: kuto vaiṣāṃ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo vā bhaviṣyati - svataḥ parata ubhayato'hetuto vā samutpattiriti sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ ||
SA10n1049:798: kathaṃ punaridaṃ niścitarūpaṃ vākyamupalabhyate bhavatām - na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetuto bhāvā bhavantīti? ucyate |
SA10n1049:807: kiṃ tu lokata eva yā prasiddhopapattiḥ,
SA10n1049:809: yathaiva hi vidyamānāmapi śarīrāśucitāṃ viparyāsānugatā rāgiṇo nopalabhante,
SA10n1049:811: teṣāṃ vairāgyārthaṃ tathāgatanirmito devo vā śubhasaṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāyadoṣānupavarṇayet - santyasmin kāye keśā ityādinā |
SA10n1049:812: te ca tasyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā vimuktā vairāgyamāsādayeyuḥ |
SA10n1049:813: evamihāpyāryaiḥ sarvathāpyanupalabhyamānātmakaṃ bhāvānāmavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītaṃ svabhāvamadhyāropya kkacicca kaṃcidviśeṣamatitarāṃ pari kliśyanti pṛthagjanāḥ |
SA10n1049:815: yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛdādibhya utpāda ityabhyupetam,
SA10n1049:817: yathā ca parabhūtebhyo jvālāṅgārādibhyo 'ṅkurasyotpattirnāsti iti abhyupetam,
SA10n1049:825: tasmādanutpannā bhāvā ityevaṃ tāvadviparītasvarūpādhyāropapratipakṣeṇa prathamaprakaraṇā rambhaḥ |
SA10n1049:828: gantṛgantavyagamanādiko'pi niravaśeṣo viśeṣo nāsti pratītyasamutpādasyeti pratipādanārtham ||
SA10n1049:829: atha syāt - eṣa eva pramāṇapremeyavyavahāro laukiko'smābhiḥ śāstreṇānuvarṇita iti,
SA10n1049:834: yadi hi kutārkikairviparītalakṣaṇapraṇayanātkṛtaṃ lakṣyavaiparītyaṃ lokasya syāt,
SA10n1049:839: tāni pramāṇāni kena paricchidyanta ityādinā vigrahavyāvartanyāṃ vihito doṣaḥ |
SA10n1049:841: kiṃ ca | yadi svasāmānyalakṣaṇadvayānurodhena pramāṇadvayamuktaṃ yasya tallakṣaṇadvayam ,
SA10n1049:843: yadyasti, tadā tadaparaṃ prameyamastīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam?
SA10n1049:845: tadā lakṣaṇamapi nirāśrayaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam?
SA10n1049:850: kiṃ tarhi ' kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam' iti karmaṇi lyuṭaṃ kṛtvā lakṣyate taditi lakṣaṇam |
SA10n1049:852: tasya karaṇasya karmaṇo'rthāntaratvāt sa eva doṣaḥ ||
SA10n1049:853: atha syāt- jñānasya karaṇatvāttasya ca svalakṣaṇāntarbhāvādayamadoṣa iti , ucyate |
SA10n1049:855: tadyathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vedanāyā viṣayānubhavo vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ |
SA10n1049:856: tena hi tallakṣyata iti kṛtvā prasiddhānugatāṃ ca vyutpattimavadhūya karmasādhanamabhyupagacchati |
SA10n1049:857: vijñānasya ca karaṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyamānenetyuktaṃ bhavati svalakṣaṇasyaiva karmatā svalakṣaṇāntarasya karaṇabhāvaśceti |
SA10n1049:859: tasya vyatiriktena karmaṇā bhavitavyamiti sa eva doṣaḥ ||
SA10n1049:860: atha syāt- yatpṛthivyādigataṃ kāṭhinyādikaṃ vijñānagamyaṃ tattasya karmāstyeva,
SA10n1049:862: evaṃ tarhi vijñānasvalakṣaṇasya karmatvābhāvātprameyatvaṃ na syāt,
SA10n1049:864: tataśca dvividhaṃ prameyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca ityetadviśeṣya vaktavyam - kiṃcitsvalakṣaṇaṃ prameyaṃ yallakṣyata ityevaṃ vyapadiśyate,
SA10n1049:866: atha tadapi karmasādhanaṃ tadā tasyānyena karaṇena bhavitavyam |
SA10n1049:869: tatastayā svasaṃvityā grahaṇātkarmatāyā satyāmastyeva prameyāntarbhāva iti, ucyate |
SA10n1049:870: vistareṇa madhyamakāvatāre svasaṃvittiniṣedhāt svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇāntareṇa lakṣyate,
SA10n1049:873: tadapi nāma jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇavyatirekeṇāsiddherasaṃbhavāllakṣyābhāve nirāśrayalakṣaṇapravṛttyasaṃbhavāt sarvathā nāstīti kutaḥ svasaṃvittiḥ?
SA10n1049:884: tadyathāpi nāma tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā na śakyate chettum,
SA10n1049:886: evameva na tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ śakyaṃ draṣṭum |
SA10n1049:887: tasyaivaṃ yoniśaḥ prayuktasya yā cittasyānavasthānatā anucchedāśāśvatatā na kūṭasthatā nāhetukī na pratyayaviruddhā na tato nānyato na saiva nānyā |
SA10n1049:888: tāṃ cittadhārāṃ cittalatāṃ cittadharmatāṃ cittānavasthitatāṃ cittāpracāratāṃ cittādṛśyatāṃ cittasvalakṣaṇatāṃ tathā jānāti tathā paśyati yathā tathatāṃ na ca nirodhayati |
SA10n1049:889: tāṃ ca cittavivekatāṃ tathā prajānāti tathā paśyati |
SA10n1049:893: kiṃ ca | bhedena vā tallakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyātsyādabhedena vā?
SA10n1049:905: na ca vinā tattvānyatvena lakṣyalakṣaṇasiddhau anyā gatirasti |
SA10n1049:908: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate ||iti ||
SA10n1049:911: avācyatā hi nāma parasparavibhāgaparijñānābhāve sati bhavati |
SA10n1049:915: iti viśeṣataḥ paricchedāsaṃbhave sati dvayorapyabhāva eveti |
SA10n1049:917: api ca | yadi jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ viṣayasya paricchede, kaḥ kartā?
SA10n1049:918: na ca kartāramantareṇāsti karaṇādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ chidikriyāyāmiva |
SA10n1049:925: ekasyāṃ hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ guṇakriyānirvṛttidvāreṇāṅgībhāvopagamāt |
SA10n1049:930: jñānasya tu arthaviśeṣapariccheda iti nāsti jñānasya karaṇatvaṃ nāpi cittasya kartṛtvam |
SA10n1049:932: atha syāt-anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityāgamāt kartuḥ sarvathābhāvāt kartāramantareṇāpi vidyata eva kriyādivyavahāra iti,
SA10n1049:942: śarīraśiraḥśabdayohi buddhayādipāṇyādivatsahabhāvipadārthāntarasāpekṣatāpravṛttau śarīraśiraḥ śabdamātrālambano buddhayupajananaḥ sahacāripadārthāntarasākāṅkṣa eva vartate,
SA10n1049:947: iha tu kāṭhinyādivyatiriktapṛthivyādyasaṃbhave sati na yukto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ |
SA10n1049:950: na hi tīrthikaparikalpitā yuktividhurāḥ padārthāḥ svasamaye'bhyupagantuṃ nyāyyāḥ,
SA10n1049:958: yathaiva hi rūpādivyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1049:961: evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ yadyapi kāṭhinyādivyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ nāsti,
SA10n1049:963: tathāpi saṃvṛtireveti parasparāpekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhiṃ vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryāḥ |
SA10n1049:968: kiṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpavedanādīnāmapi nāsti saṃbhava iti teṣāmapi saṃvṛtyā śilāputrakādivannāstitvamāstheyaṃ syāt |
SA10n1049:972: kiṃ tu lokaprasiddhireṣā amunā nyāyena vyavasthāpyata iti |
SA10n1049:975: yā ? tiṣṭhatu tāvadeṣā viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣāvāhakakuśalamūlopacayahetuḥ,
SA10n1049:978: so'haṃ saṃvṛtisatyavyavasthāvaicakṣaṇyāllaukika eva pakṣe sthitvā saṃvṛtyekadeśanirākaraṇopakṣiptopapattyantaramupapattyantareṇa vinivartayan lokavṛddha iva lokacārātparibhraśyamānaṃ bhavantameva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim |
SA10n1049:987: śabdārthaṃ kriyākaraṇādikaṃ ca necchatīti aho vata icchāmātrapratibaddhapravṛttito (vṛttiḥ?) bhavataḥ |
SA10n1049:988: yadā caivaṃ prameyadvayamavyavasthitaṃ tadā svasāmānyalakṣaṇāviṣayatvena āgamādīnāṃ pramāṇāntaratvam |
SA10n1049:989: kiṃ ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityevamādikasya laukikavyavahārasyāsaṃgrahādanāryavyavahārābhyupagamācca avyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti na yuktametat ||
SA10n1049:991: tataśca yathaiva kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ sukha utpāda iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10n1049:992: evaṃ pratyakṣanīlādi nimittako'pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣa iti vyapadiśyate |
SA10n1049:996: sa sukha iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddha evetyevaṃviṣaye yukta upacāraḥ |
SA10n1049:997: ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityatra tu - na hi ghaṭo nāma kaścidyo'pratyakṣaḥ pṛthagupalabdho yasyopacārātpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt |
SA10n1049:1003: lokavyavahārāṅga bhūto ghaṭo yadi nīlādivyatirikto nāstīti kṛtvā tasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10n1049:1004: nanvevaṃ sati pṛthivyādivyatirekeṇa nīlādikamapi nāstīti nīlāderasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kalpyatām | yathoktam-
SA10n1049:1006: vāyvādivyatirekeṇa tathā rūpaṃ na vidyate || iti |
SA10n1049:1012: sarva eva ghaṭo'dṛṣṭo rūpe dṛṣṭe hi jāyate |
SA10n1049:1017: pratigatamakṣa masminniti kṛtvā ghaṭanīlādīnāmaparokṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati |
SA10n1049:1018: tatparicchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇatuṣāgnivat pratyakṣakāraṇatvāt pratyakṣatvaṃ vyapadiśyate |
SA10n1049:1019: yastu akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaśabdaṃ vyutpādayati,
SA10n1049:1020: tasya jñānasyendriyāviṣayatvād viṣayaviṣayatvācca na yuktā vyutpattiḥ |
SA10n1049:1022: atha syāt-yathā ubhayādhīnāyāmapi vijñānapravṛtau āśrayasya paṭumandatānuvidhānād vijñānānāṃ tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayeṇaivavyapadeśo bhavati cakṣurvijñānamiti,
SA10n1049:1024: tathāpi akṣamakṣamāśritya vartamānaṃ vijñānamāśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣamiti bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1049:1025: dṛṣṭo hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśo bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti |
SA10n1049:1027: tatra hi viṣayeṇa vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpavijñānamityevamādinā vijñānaṣaṭkasya bhedo nopadarśitaḥ syāt,
SA10n1049:1029: tathā hi nīlādivijñānaṣaṭke vijñānamityukte sākāṅkṣa eva pratyayājjāyate kimetadrūpīndriyajaṃ vijñānamāhosvinmānasamiti |
SA10n1049:1030: āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaviṣaye pravṛttisaṃbhave'pi parasparabhedaḥ siddho bhavati |
SA10n1049:1031: iha tu pramāṇa lakṣaṇavivakṣayā kalpanāpoḍhamātrasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagame sati vikalpādeva tadviśeṣatvābhimatatvādasādhāraṇakāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcit prayojanamupalakṣyate |
SA10n1049:1032: prameyaparatantrāyāṃ ca pramāṇasaṃkhyāpravṛttau prameyākārānukāritāmātratayā ca samāsāditātmabhāvasattākayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanānnendriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcidupakarotīti sarvathā viṣayeṇaiva vyapadeśo nyāyyaḥ ||
SA10n1049:1033: loke pratyakṣaśabdasya prasiddhatvādvivakṣite'rthe pratyarthaśabdasyāprasiddhatvādāśrayeṇaiva vyutpattirāśrīyata iti cet, ucyate |
SA10n1049:1037: yathāsthitalaukikapadārthatiraskāreṇa tu tadvayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddhaśabda tiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt,
SA10n1049:1039: ekasya ca cakṣurvijñānasya ekendriyakṣaṇāśrayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ na syād vīpsārthābhāvāt,
SA10n1049:1040: ekaikasya ca pratyakṣatvābhāve bahūnāmapi na syāt ||
SA10n1049:1043: laukikasya ca pramāṇaprameyavyavahārasya vyākhyātumiṣṭatvād vyarthaiva pratyakṣapramāṇakalpanā saṃjāyate |
SA10n1049:1044: cakṣurvijñānasāmaṅgī nīlaṃ jānāti no tu nīlamiti cāgamasya pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānārthasyāprastutatvāt,
SA10n1049:1045: pañcānāmindriyavijñānānāṃ jaḍatvapratipādakatvācca nāgamādapi kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva vijñānasya pratyakṣatvamiti na yuktametat |
SA10n1049:1046: tasmālloke yadi lakṣyaṃ yadi vā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
SA10n1049:1048: ataḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadviṣayeṇa jñānena saha |
SA10n1049:1053: sādṛśyādananubhūtārthadhigama upamānaṃ gauriva gavaya iti yathā ||
SA10n1049:1055: tāni ca parasparāpekṣayā sidhyanti-satsu pramāṇeṣu prameyārthāḥ,
SA10n1049:1057: no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇaprameyayoḥ siddhiriti |
SA10n1049:1060: laukika eva darśane sthitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā ||3 ||
SA10n1049:1061: atrāhuḥ svayūthyāḥ - yadidamuktaṃ na svata utpadyante bhāvā iti,
SA10n1049:1069: tadayuktam yasmātparabhūtā eva bhagavatā bhāvānāmutpādakā nirdiṣṭāḥ |
SA10n1049:1086: atrocyate- naiva hi bhāvānāṃ parabhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpattiriti | yasmāt -
SA10n1049:1087: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate |
SA10n1049:1089: iti | yadi hi hetvādiṣu parabhuteṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyastasamasteṣu hetupratyaya sāmagyā anyatra vā kkacid bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmutpādātpūrvaṃ sattvaṃ syāt,
SA10n1049:1100: athavā bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmaṅkurādīnāṃ vījādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsvavikṛtarūpeṣu nāsti svabhāvo nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt ||
SA10n1049:1104: tasmādavidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ paratvaṃ bījādīnāṃ nāstīti paravyapadeśābhāvādeva na parata utpāda iti |
SA10n1049:1108: tadevaṃ pratyayebhya utpādavādini pratiṣiddhe kriyāta utpādavādī manyate- na cakṣūrūpādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sākṣādvijñānaṃ janayanti |
SA10n1049:1116: sā cakṣurādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānaṃ janayet |
SA10n1049:1119: iha kriyeyamiṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate,
SA10n1049:1125: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam |
SA10n1049:1128: kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā |
SA10n1049:1145: na hi tantumayaḥ paṭo na yukta iti vīraṇamayo'bhyupagamyate |
SA10n1049:1151: tadā kriyārahitā akriyāvanto nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ kathaṃ janakāḥ?
SA10n1049:1152: atha kriyāvanta eva janakā iti, ucyate -
SA10n1049:1159: evaṃ parikriyādayo'pi bhāvā uktā veditavyā iti nāsti kriyāto'pi samutpattirbhāvānāmiti bhavatyutpādābhidhānamarthaśūnyam ||6 ||
SA10n1049:1160: atrāha- kiṃ na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayā ityādivicāreṇa?
SA10n1049:1161: yasmāccakṣurādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñānādayo bhāvā jāyante,
SA10n1049:1166: yadi cakṣurādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānamutpadyate iti asya ime pratyayā ucyante ,
SA10n1049:1167: nanu yāvattadvijñānākhyaṃ kāryaṃ notpadyate tāvadime cakṣurādayaḥ kathaṃ nāpratyayāḥ?
SA10n1049:1168: apratyayā evetyabhiprāyaḥ na cāpratyayebhya utpattiḥ sikatābhya iva tailasya |
SA10n1049:1169: atha matam-pūrvamapratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcidanyaṃ pratyayamapekṣya pratyayatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti,
SA10n1049:1171: yat tat pratyayāntaramapratyayasya tasya pratyayatvena kalpyate,
SA10n1049:1172: tadapi pratyayatve sati asya pratyayo bhavati |
SA10n1049:1174: kiṃ ca | iha ime cakṣurādayo vijñānasya pratyayāḥ kalpyamānāḥ sato vā asya kalpyeran, asato vā?
SA10n1049:1178: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim ||8 ||
SA10n1049:1179: asato hyarthasya avidyamānasya kathaṃ pratyayaḥ syāt?
SA10n1049:1185: evaṃ samastānāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāryotpādanāsāmarthyena apratyayatvamudbhāvya ataḥ paraṃ vyastānāmapratyayatvaṃ pratipādyate ||
SA10n1049:1191: syāddhetupratyayo yadi tasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt | yasmāt -
SA10n1049:1192: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā |
SA10n1049:1193: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate ||9 ||
SA10n1049:1215: ayaṃ ca vidyamānānāṃ vā parikalpyeta avidyamānānāṃ vā |
SA10n1049:1219: athaivamanālambane dharme svātmanā prasiddhe kimasya ālambanayogena parikalpitena,
SA10n1049:1220: ityanālambana evāyaṃ san vidyamāno dharmaḥ cittādikaḥ kevalaṃ sālambana ityucyate bhavadbhiḥ svamanīṣikayā,
SA10n1049:1231: tenāyamarthaḥ- athaivamanālambane dharme'sati avidyamāne bhūyaḥ kuta ālambanam?
SA10n1049:1240: tenaivaṃ pāṭhaḥ- niruddhe ca pratyayaḥ kaḥ?
SA10n1049:1244: atra vicāryate- anutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kāryabhūteṣvaṅkurādiṣu nirodho nopapadyate kāraṇasya bījādeḥ |
SA10n1049:1248: evaṃ sati niruddha bīje abhāvībhūte aṅkurasya kaḥ pratyayaḥ?
SA10n1049:1252: tena anutpanne cāṅkure bījādīnāṃ nirodhe iṣyamāṇe'pyubhayametadahetukamapadyata iti nānantaramato yuktam |
SA10n1049:1254: na svato nāpi parata ityādinā utpādo niṣiddhaḥ,
SA10n1049:1262: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ |
SA10n1049:1266: bhāvānāṃ ca pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvābhāve kutastada yadasminniti kāraṇatvena vyapadiśyate,
SA10n1049:1269: atrāha - tantvādibhyaḥ paṭādikamupalabhya paṭādestantvādayaḥ pratyayā iti |
SA10n1049:1275: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat ||13 ||
SA10n1049:1276: tatra vyasteṣu tantuturīvematasaraśalākādiṣu pratyayeṣu paṭo nāsti,
SA10n1049:1286: apratyayebhyo'pi vīraṇādibhyaḥ kasmānnābhipravartate paṭa iti nāsti phalapravṛttiḥ svarūpataḥ ||14 ||
SA10n1049:1287: atrāha - yadi anyat phalaṃ syādanye ca pratyayāḥ,
SA10n1049:1288: tadā kiṃ pratyayeṣu phalamasti nāstīti cintā syāt |
SA10n1049:1297: syāt paṭo yadi tantava eva svabhāvasiddhāḥ syuḥ |
SA10n1049:1298: te hi aṃśumayā aṃśuvikārā na svabhāvasiddhāḥ |
SA10n1049:1312: tathā ca bhavān bravīti -yadi asat phalaṃ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate,
SA10n1049:1314: na cāsati phale paṭakaṭākhye tantuvīraṇānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ yuktam,
SA10n1049:1318: sati hi phale ime'sya pratyayā ime'pratyayā iti syāt |
SA10n1049:1341: yo na pi jāyati nā cupapadyī
SA10n1049:1342: no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ |
